info.title: Accounts API
info.description: These are all the APIs related to accounts

get.summary: Get report export for the protocol

post.description: Create a new form for a trial container

message.example: Bad request. Missing or invalid input parameters.

version_number.description: The version number of the form template

reporting.description: Whether the user has reporting permissions

pdf_previews_enabled.description: Whether the account has PDF previews enabled

video_timecode_enabled.description: Whether the account has video timecode enabled

created_at.description: The date the row was created

BadRequest.description: Bad request. Missing or invalid input parameters.

Unauthorised.description: Unauthorised. Missing or invalid authentication credentials.

Forbidden.description: Forbidden. The request was valid, but the server is refusing action.

error.example: You do not have sufficient permission to perform this action
enum: You do not have sufficient permission to perform this action

NotFound.description: Not found. The requested resource was not found.

Conflict.description: Conflict. The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.

InternalServerError.description: Internal server error. Please contact support.
